about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Innokaiz India Limited provides event management, corporate gifting, advertising, and marketing services through both offline and online formats.

The company's service model is divided into the following categories:

1. Advertising and Marketing Services:

  • Outdoor Advertisements: The company provides services at outdoor Bus Shelters, Arches, Police Booth, General Booth, Pole Kiosk, Signal Post, Temp Hoarding, Sun Pack flute Board, Backdrop, Banners, Roadshows, Mobile Vans, Etc. In signage: Backlit Board, Nonlit Board, ACP Pylon, Acrylic Boards, Cutout, Standee, Etc.
  • Digital Marketing: SEO, UI/UX, Content Marketing, and Web Development.

2. Event Management: The company organizes and manages all the requirements for Corporate Events including Meetings, Incentive Programs, and Conferences, Exhibitions (MICE). They arrange events for Banking, Insurance, Asset Management Companies, etc., and have organized over 200 events of various magnitudes so far.

3. Corporate Gifting: The company provides corporate gifting vouchers and customized solutions suitable to all occasions including personalization and providing logo printing as per designs.

4. E-commerce: The company also provides Home Appliances, Electronic Gadgets, Mobiles, Laptops, Toys & day to day needs products through its e-commerce platform.

The company holds World Record for Conducting 15,250 Roadshows/ Lead Generation and Sales Promotion activities.

faqs.question: What is the Innokaiz India IPO?
faqs.answer:
Innokaiz India IPO is a SME IPO of 2713600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹21.17 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹78 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on April 28, 2023, and closes on May 3, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Innokaiz India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Innokaiz India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Innokaiz India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Innokaiz India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Innokaiz India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Innokaiz India IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Innokaiz India IPO opens on April 28, 2023 and closes on May 3, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Innokaiz India IPO?
faqs.answer: Innokaiz India IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Innokaiz India IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Innokaiz India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Innokaiz India IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Innokaiz India IPO will be done on Monday, May 8, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, May 10, 2023. Check the Innokaiz India IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Innokaiz India IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Innokaiz India IPO listing date is on Thursday, May 11, 2023.
